Raggett, Ben-Natan (cont')

Prompts such as "You have not entered any selection, please enter your selection now" should not be attribute values, since in-line markup is as necessary for such prompts as for contents

Prompts and other representational contents must be markup

So, this example would look better as 
 
<MENU> 
  <OPTION URL=Instructions.html>Directions 
  <OPTION URL=Todo>List of things to do 
</MENU>
where the <MENU> element here explicitly marks the concept of a menu
(We could have used the <SELECT> tag)
